pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Methods for Identifying Differential Enrichment Regions with ChIP-Seq Data // Nonparametric Tests to identify the differential enrichment region for two conditions or time- course ChIP-seq data. It includes: data preprocessing function, estimation of a small constant used in hypothesis testing, a kernel-based two sample nonparametric test, two assumption-free two sample nonparametric test.
